about_the_game:
MonoRace is a cheerful monobike racing where you can explore tracks and get points by performing tricks. Try the game in VR and PC versions with unique controls.

Monobikes is an electric, self-balancing unicycles, and you need to lean your body to control them. We have transferred this control mechanism to the game.
In VR game lean forward to accelerate, lean back to brake and lean left or right to turn.
In PC version move a mouse to control your unicycle.

Experience the game:
  • There will be a lot of tracks available and there will be several race paths on each of them. You can ride the main path or you can take a short cut.
  • Get benefits by collecting bonuses.
  • Perform mortal tricks to get points and survive to the end without fail.
  • Be the quickest, or all your tricks point will be lost.
  • Lead in Leagues: complete exercises and get points to upgrade the unicycle and unlock new tracks.

Multiplayer mode: it's much more interesting to compete with other players and you will have this opportunity.

In training mode, you can try our unique control system and practice tricks.
